titles: Some short but necessary animadversions on the paper delivered to Dr. Hawkins together with a copy of the paper it self, entituled, The confession of Edward Fitz-Harris, Esq. written by his own hand and delivered &c. / reprinted from the copy published by the doctor, and these animadversions added to prevent the deluding of Protestants by it.
author: Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681.
Hawkins, Francis, 1628-1681.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
keywords: Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681. --  Confession of Edward Fitz-Harys, Esq.
